attributes.action: Place illegal immigrants in prisoner of war camps.
attributes.additional_details: To deter immigrants illegally invading our country .
attributes.background: Place illegal immigrants crossing the channel in p.o.w.camps

rejection.details:
Prisoners of war are defined by international treaties.  You could start a petition calling for the Government to seek to negotiate a different international approach to prisoners of war if that's what you'd like to see happen. 

People who have entered the country illegally are already subject to detention. You can find out more here: 

https://migrationobservatory.ox.ac.uk/resources/briefings/immigration-detention-in-the-uk/
